696710338016886784.text: We want a government whose goal is to build a virtuous society, a tolerant environment, a cohesive family, educated generations and equal economic opportunities for all.

344853768657072128.text: Our relations with France go back a long way. France is our friend & ally. The common interests between our ppl strengthen this relationship

344853444236025856.text: We're the leading economic partner of France regionally. We cooperate in defense, renewable & nuclear energy, cultural & scientific affairs

344853258747129857.text: I met the Prime Minister of France .we discussed ways to enhance relations in economic, tourism and cultural domains http://t.co/dn8d7Wri8S

344844367023968256.text: I also presented the Prime Minister with a copy of my visionary book, in which we summed up our development perspective in the race for leadership http://t.co/bvUSyAJnOU

344835910141091841.text: Our relations with the French Republic are old and deep. It is a friendly and allied country. The common and strong interests between our two peoples strengthen and strengthen this relationship.

344835563465101315.text: We are France's leading economic partners in the region. There is cooperation in the fields of defense, renewable energy, nuclear energy, cultural and scientific affairs.

344835290709508096.text: Today I met the French Prime Minister and discussed the development of relations between our two countries in the economic, tourism and cultural fields http://t.co/eKk5RjlfMs

344816285777027072.text: We will keep our promise in connecting great minds to build a better future and we will organize the best event in the history of World Expo

344815933308678144.text: Never was Expo held in the Middle East, Africa or Southeast Asia before. We expect 25 million visitors to this global event

344815635546664960.text: We have what it takes to host this important international event. I'm optimistic as usual and our team wave an excellent presentation

344815442826784768.text: Attended today the presentation of our bid to host Expo 2020 at the BIE office in Paris

344790023167672320.text: We will fulfill our promise during the exhibition to gather the best minds to make a better future for all .. We will organize the best course in the history of the exhibition ..

344789630740221952.text: The Expo 2020 has never been held in the Middle East, Africa or Southeast Asia. We expect 25 million visitors to visit the exhibition.

344789355354808320.text: We have all the ingredients that qualify us to host this international event .. Optimistic as usual .. And our team made a distinguished presentation

344789228032491520.text: Today, I attended the presentation of our file to host Expo 2020 at the International Exhibition Bureau in Paris.

344398818885898242.text: We want to establish real connections, to build a better future for the people of our region & to restore its role in history and civilization

344398357990621184.text: The Middle East is not a region of tensions & conflicts but a region where cultures, civilizations and innovation can meet and flourish

344398038615334913.text: We want to connect the best minds of the world to present new solutions to global challenges, which can not be treated with individually
